column4: can anybody here direct me to somewhere I can get some rookie help? ubuntu-beginners is empty.
If you're using Ubuntu then yes, this is the place to be. For dual monitors have you tried using "Monitors" in System Settings?
What happens when you try to configure dual monitors?
Your messages to me will only be highlighted in my client if you use my full nick.
and ubotto - not understanding the tab function, and hitting the key doesnt do anything
If you type "Jorda" then hit tab it doesn't complete automatically to "Jordan_U" ?
now it did.  Maybe I didnt type enough letters
did you see the error message above?
the selected config for displays could not be applied, required virtual size...
Did you log out then back in again?
I did. No luck.
Do you get the same error when you try to add the second monitor again after logging out and in?
I have only tried to log in out once. Let me try again.
I tried loggin in and out, and still get the same error message.
What graphics card are you using?
I am running a radeon hd4650, its in the supported list
Have you tried the "Additional Drivers" utility?
I probably did awhile ago. I used to have both monitors and sound working, but then I think I let it automatic update and it all went away
where is the additionally drivers utility located?
In System Settings.
The additional drivers utility says that I am using is a proprietary driver.
You can try disabling the proprietary driver, but that may just make things worse.
Actually, part of the problem may be that you weren't using ATI's tools for setting up displays.
I will try ATI's tools. i'll be back shortly.
